item.title: Contract Tests - APIs Guided by Consumers
item.description: Integrating APIs is an activity that requires careful analysis, as it involves the dependency of a microservice on an external resource. This integration adds a level of risk to operations, as discrepancies between expected and received data can result in integration failures. Ensuring that the API integration is working correctly is a crucial priority, considering that any eventual problem can impact the end user. An approach that generates value in scenarios involving API integration is the Contract Test.
